DOC.brief_summary: This is an efficacy study of bepotastine besilate nasal spray in seasonal allergic rhinitis.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Bepotastine in the Treatment of Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis
DOC.criteria: Male or female at least 12 years of age with a history of mountain cedar allergy No active nasal infection or nasal abnormality that would affect subject safety or symptom assessments
